BE.name: Shinobi™
BE.description: Vous seul pouvez les sauver. Vous êtes Joe Musashi, leader rouge de l'école Oboro de Shinobi, et votre destin vous attend. Une force maléfique émanant de Neo City a capturé les autres élèves, et c'est à vous de les libérer, armé de votre puissant katana. Chaque ninja délivré mettra son arsenal, son entraînement et sa magie Ninjutsu à votre service. Éliminez vos ennemis à l'aide d'armes redoutables, dont des bombes, des shurikens et votre sabre. Lancez des sorts dévastateurs : la puissance de la tornade et l'éclat déchirant de la foudre sont entre vos mains. Si cela ne suffit pas, transformez-vous en bombe humaine : rien ne résistera au souffle de la déflagration. Tant que la Cité de l'angoisse ne sera pas détruite, vos ennemis n'auront aucun répit ! Êtes-vous prêt à mener une véritable guerre ? - De nombreuses aptitudes spéciales : courir sur l'eau, se balancer sur son sabre, marcher au plafond... - Des sorts Ninjutsu : tornades, séismes, champs d'énergie...

BG.name: Shinobi™
BG.description: Only you can save them. As Joe Musashi, Red leader of the Oboro School of Shinobi, your destiny awaits. An evil force emanating from Neo City has captured your fellow students. Attack with your powerful katana as you battle for their freedom. Each ninja you rescue adds their formidable weaponry, training and Ninjutsu magic to yours. Destroy the enemies with bombs, shurikens, a crescent blade and more. Use the magic of the ninja to wreak havoc with the force of a tornado or the blinding glow of lightning. When all else fails, turn your body into a living bomb and explode with concussive damage. Do not stop until the City of Fear is annihilated! Are you ready for the challenge of Ninja warfare? -Special abilities include running on water, swinging from a crescent blade and walking on ceilings -Ninjutsu magic includes tornadoes, earthquakes and energy fields

DK.name: Shinobi™
DK.description: Only you can save them. As Joe Musashi, Red leader of the Oboro School of Shinobi, your destiny awaits. An evil force emanating from Neo City has captured your fellow students. Are you ready for the challenge of Ninja warfare? -Special abilities include running on water, swinging from a crescent blade and walking on ceilings -Ninjutsu magic includes tornadoes, earthquakes and energy fields

CH.name: Shinobi™
CH.description: Du allein kannst sie retten. Als Joe Musashi, roter Anführer der Oboro-Schule der Shinobi, siehst du deinem Schicksal entgegen. Eine böse Macht, deren Ursprung in Neo City liegt, hat deine Mitschüler gefangen genommen. Kämpfe mit deinem mächtigen Katana und bringe ihnen die Freiheit zurück. Für jeden geretteten Ninja werden dir dessen beeindruckende Waffen, sein Training und Ninjutsu-Magie übertragen. Vernichte die Feinde mit Bomben, Shuriken, einer Halbmondklinge und vielen anderen Waffen. Setze die Magie des Ninja ein und richte mit der Kraft eines Wirbelsturms oder dem blendenden Strahlen eines Blitzes verheerenden Schaden an. Als allerletzte Maßnahme kannst du auch deinen Körper in eine lebende Bombe verwandeln und selbst explodieren! Höre erst dann auf, wenn die Stadt der Angst zerstört wurde! Bist du bereit, dich der Herausforderung der Kriegskunst der Ninja zu stellen? - Zu den besonderen Fähigkeiten zählt das Laufen über Wasser, das Schwingen an einer Halbmondklinge und das Gehen an der Decke - Zur Ninjutsu-Magie gehören Wirbelstürme, Erdbeben und Energiefelder

DE.name: Shinobi™
DE.description: Du allein kannst sie retten. Als Joe Musashi, roter Anführer der Oboro-Schule der Shinobi, siehst du deinem Schicksal entgegen. Eine böse Macht, deren Ursprung in Neo City liegt, hat deine Mitschüler gefangen genommen. Kämpfe mit deinem mächtigen Katana und bringe ihnen die Freiheit zurück. Für jeden geretteten Ninja werden dir dessen beeindruckende Waffen, sein Training und Ninjutsu-Magie übertragen. Bist du bereit, dich der Herausforderung der Kriegskunst der Ninja zu stellen? - Zu den besonderen Fähigkeiten zählt das Laufen über Wasser, das Schwingen an einer Halbmondklinge und das Gehen an der Decke - Zur Ninjutsu-Magie gehören Wirbelstürme, Erdbeben und Energiefelder

ES.name: Shinobi™
ES.description: Solo tú puedes salvarlos. Como Joe Musashi, líder rojo de la escuela Oboro de Shinobi, tu destino te aguarda. Una fuerza maligna que emana de Neo City ha capturado a tus compañeros. Ataca con tu potente katana mientras luchas por tu libertad. Cada ninja que rescates añadirá su formidable armamento, entrenamiento y magia Ninjutsu a los tuyos. Destruye a tus enemigos con bombas, shurikens, una espada de media luna y mucho más. Usa la magia de los ninjas para sembrar el caos con la fuerza de un tornado o el brillo cegador del relámpago. Y, cuando todo lo demás falle, convierte tu cuerpo en una bomba viviente para explotar y provocar daños devastadores. ¡No te detengas hasta que la Ciudad del Miedo sea aniquilada! ¿Estás preparado para el desafío de la guerra ninja? - Habilidades especiales, como correr sobre el agua, impulsarse con una espada de media luna y caminar por el techo - Magia Ninjutsu que incluye tornados, terremotos y campos de energía

CY.name: Shinobi™
CY.description: Only you can save them. As Joe Musashi, Red leader of the Oboro School of Shinobi, your destiny awaits. An evil force emanating from Neo City has captured your fellow students. Attack with your powerful katana as you battle for their freedom. Each ninja you rescue adds their formidable weaponry, training and Ninjutsu magic to yours. Destroy the enemies with bombs, shurikens, a crescent blade and more. Use the magic of the ninja to wreak havoc with the force of a tornado or the blinding glow of lightning. When all else fails, turn your body into a living bomb and explode with concussive damage. Do not stop until the City of Fear is annihilated! Are you ready for the challenge of Ninja warfare? -Special abilities include running on water, swinging from a crescent blade and walking on ceilings -Ninjutsu magic includes tornadoes, earthquakes and energy fields

FR.name: Shinobi™
FR.description: Vous seul pouvez les sauver. Vous êtes Joe Musashi, leader rouge de l'école Oboro de Shinobi, et votre destin vous attend. Une force maléfique émanant de Neo City a capturé les autres élèves, et c'est à vous de les libérer, armé de votre puissant katana. Chaque ninja délivré mettra son arsenal, son entraînement et sa magie Ninjutsu à votre service. Éliminez vos ennemis à l'aide d'armes redoutables, dont des bombes, des shurikens et votre sabre. IT.name: Shinobi™
IT.description: Solo tu puoi salvarli. Vesti i panni di Joe Musashi, il leader rosso della scuola Oboro di Shinobi: il tuo destino ti chiama! Una forza malvagia emanata da Neo City ha catturato i tuoi allievi. Attacca brandendo la tua potente katana e combatti per liberarli. Ogni ninja che salvi ti dona le sue formidabili armi, l'addestramento e la magia Ninjutsu. Distruggi i nemici con bombe, shuriken, sciabola e altre armi. Usa la magia dei ninja per scatenare l'inferno sotto forma di tornado o di luce accecante. Se tutto il resto fallisce, trasformati in una bomba vivente ed esplodi per causare danni letali. Non fermarti finché la Città del Terrore non sarà distrutta! Sei pronto per affrontare una guerra fra ninja? - Abilità speciali, fra cui: correre sull'acqua, oscillare appeso alla sciabola, camminare sul soffitto - Magia Ninjutsu, fra cui: tornado, terremoti e campi di forza

GB.name: Shinobi™
GB.description: Only you can save them. As Joe Musashi, Red leader of the Oboro School of Shinobi, your destiny awaits. An evil force emanating from Neo City has captured your fellow students. Are you ready for the challenge of Ninja warfare? -Special abilities include running on water, swinging from a crescent blade and walking on ceilings -Ninjutsu magic includes tornadoes, earthquakes and energy fields

NL.name: Shinobi™
NL.description: Alleen jij kunt ze redden. Aanvaard je lot als Joe Musashi, rode leider van de Oboro-school van Shinobi. Een kwade macht uit Neo City heeft je medeleerlingen gevangengenomen. Val aan met je sterke katana en vecht voor hun vrijheid. Telkens als je een ninja redt, krijg je de kennis over zijn of haar formidabele wapentuig, training en ninjutsu-magie. Vernietig de tegenstanders met bommen, shuriken, een halvemaanzwaard en nog veel meer. Zaai chaos met de magie van de ninja, de kracht van een tornado of de verblindende gloed van de bliksem. En als het echt niet anders kan, verander je in een levende bom en breng je jezelf tot ontploffing om schade aan te richten. Stop pas als de City of Fear is vernietigd! Ben jij klaar voor de uitdaging van ninja-oorlogvoering? - Speciale vaardigheden zijn onder andere rennen over water, zwaaien vanaf een halvemaanzwaard en lopen over plafonds. - Via ninjutsu-magie kun je tornado's, aardbevingen en energievelden opwekken.

LT.name: Shinobi™
LT.description: Only you can save them. As Joe Musashi, Red leader of the Oboro School of Shinobi, your destiny awaits. An evil force emanating from Neo City has captured your fellow students. AU.name: Shinobi™
AU.description: Only you can save them. As Joe Musashi, Red leader of the Oboro School of Shinobi, your destiny awaits. An evil force emanating from Neo City has captured your fellow students. Attack with your powerful katana as you battle for their freedom. Each ninja you rescue adds their formidable weaponry, training and Ninjutsu magic to yours. Destroy the enemies with bombs, shurikens, a crescent blade and more. Use the magic of the ninja to wreak havoc with the force of a tornado or the blinding glow of lightning. Are you ready for the challenge of Ninja warfare? -Special abilities include running on water, swinging from a crescent blade and walking on ceilings -Ninjutsu magic includes tornadoes, earthquakes and energy fields

RU.name: Shinobi™
RU.description: Только вы можете их спасти. Вас ждет путь героя Joe Musashi, основателя школы Oboro, в которой готовят настоящих Shinobi. Враги из города Neo City захватили ваших учеников. Вам предстоит освободить их, расчищая путь верной катаной. Каждый спасенный ниндзя добавляет вам грозное оружие, способности и магические приемы Ninjutsu. Уничтожайте противников с помощью бомб, сюрикенов, сабель и другого оружия. Используйте магию ниндзя для вызова торнадо или молнии. В крайнем случае превратите свое тело в огромную бомбу и взорвитесь, уничтожая все вокруг. Не останавливайтесь, пока Город страха не будет разрушен до основания! Готовы ли вы к войне ниндзя? -В число особых умений входят способности бегать по воде, уворачиваться от клинков и ходить по потолку. -В число магических приемов Ninjutsu входят вызов торнадо, землетрясений и использование силовых полей.

PT.name: Shinobi™
PT.description: Só tu podes salvá-los. Na pele de Joe Musashi, líder vermelho da Escola Oboro de Shinobi, o teu destino aguarda-te. Uma força malévola emana da Neo City e capturou os teus companheiros. Ataca com a tua potente katana enquanto combates pela sua liberdade. Cada ninja que salvares transfere o seu fabuloso arsenal de armas, treino e magia Ninjustsu ao teu. Destrói os inimigos com bombas, shurikens, uma crescent blade e muito mais. Usa a magia ninja para semear o caos com a força de um tornado ou o clarão de um trovão. Quando tudo o resto falhar, transforma o teu corpo numa bomba viva e explode com danos de concussão. Não pares até a Cidade do Medo ser aniquilada! Estás pronto para o desafio da guerrilha Ninja? -As habilidades especiais incluem correr sobre a água, balançar-se de uma crescent blade e andar no tecto. -A magia Ninjutsu inclui tornados, tremores de terra e campos energéticos.

SE.name: Shinobi™
SE.description: Only you can save them. As Joe Musashi, Red leader of the Oboro School of Shinobi, your destiny awaits. An evil force emanating from Neo City has captured your fellow students. Are you ready for the challenge of Ninja warfare? -Special abilities include running on water, swinging from a crescent blade and walking on ceilings -Ninjutsu magic includes tornadoes, earthquakes and energy fields

RO.name: Shinobi™
RO.description: Only you can save them. As Joe Musashi, Red leader of the Oboro School of Shinobi, your destiny awaits. An evil force emanating from Neo City has captured your fellow students. Attack with your powerful katana as you battle for their freedom. Each ninja you rescue adds their formidable weaponry, training and Ninjutsu magic to yours. Destroy the enemies with bombs, shurikens, a crescent blade and more. Use the magic of the ninja to wreak havoc with the force of a tornado or the blinding glow of lightning. When all else fails, turn your body into a living bomb and explode with concussive damage. Do not stop until the City of Fear is annihilated! Are you ready for the challenge of Ninja warfare? -Special abilities include running on water, swinging from a crescent blade and walking on ceilings -Ninjutsu magic includes tornadoes, earthquakes and energy fields
